name: CollieGallery
summary: Easy-to-use and highly customizable fullscreen image gallery with support for local and remote images written in Swift.
description: CollieGallery is a fullscreen image gallery with support for local and remote images and it has a lot of built-in features like zooming, panning, interactive transitions and more! The gallery is highly customizable and itâ€™s really easy to make it look and work the way you want.
